dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3015827X] Withdrawl of DMCA
dmca.body:
Please attached the below-pasted e-mail to the case in question... Thanks. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, February 09, 2007 12:50 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3015827X] Withdrawl of DMCA ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Withdrawl of DMCA Added by system at Friday, Feb 9 2007 06:45 pm X-MailFrom: crookm@twcny.rr.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Feb 9 17:54:33 2007 Received: (qmail 6500 invoked by alias); 9 Feb 2007 23:54:33 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 6497 invoked from network); 9 Feb 2007 23:54:33 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 9 Feb 2007 23:54:33 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 9 Feb 2007 17:54:32 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 09 Feb 2007 17:54:32 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from crookm@twcny.rr.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HFfZY-0005rO-Gg for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 09 Feb 2007 17:54:32 -0600 Received: from ms-smtp-02.nyroc.rr.com ([24.24.2.56]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from crookm@twcny.rr.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HFfZW-0004Lc-Pj for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 09 Feb 2007 17:54:31 -0600 Received: from MCIP03 (cpe-74-71-115-28.twcny.res.rr.com [74.71.115.28]) by ms-smtp-02.nyroc.rr.com (8.13.6/8.13.6) with ESMTP id l19NsP9G013676; Fri, 9 Feb 2007 18:54:25 -0500 (EST) Message-ID: <0e7c01c74ca5$9ae1e9c0$0502a8c0@MCIP03> From: "Michael Crook" To: , , , Cc: Subject: Withdrawl of DMCA Date: Fri, 9 Feb 2007 18:54:13 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0E79_01C74C7B.B11D8A20" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: Symantec AntiVirus Scan Engine Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of twcny.rr.com designates 24.24.2.56 as permitted sender) client-ip=24.24.2.56; envelope-from=crookm@twcny.rr.com; helo=ms-smtp-02.nyroc.rr.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 Feb 2007 23:54:32.0692 (UTC) FILETIME=[A51EC340:01C74CA5] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) February 9, 2007 To Whom it May Concern: This is in regards to a DMCA complaint that was issued to you as the webmaster, OSP, or administrator, in reference to the following URL(s): http://www.forsakethetroops.info/crook.wmv At this time, I would like to withdraw the DMCA complaint, strictly as pertains to the above URL(s), which regard a 2005 appearance on the Fox News Channel. I request that the content therefore be restored, and the DMCA complaint withdrawn, and would like to at this time apologize for any extra work or problems that this complaint has caused. I certify that the above information is true and correct to the best of my knowledge, information, and belief, and may be reached via telephone at (201) 633-7820, or via postal mail at 8417 Oswego Road #179, Baldwinsville, NY 13027. E-mail is mcipdns@gmail.com. Thank you, Michael Crook MIME element (text/html)
February 9, 2007
 
To Whom it May Concern:
 
This is in regards to a DMCA complaint that was issued to you as the webmaster, OSP, or administrator, in reference to the following URL(s):
 
http://www.forsakethet roops.info/crook.wmv
 

At this time,  I would like to withdraw the DMCA complaint, strictly as pertains to the above URL(s), which regard
a 2005 appearance on the Fox News Channel. 
 
I request that the content therefore be restored, and the DMCA complaint withdrawn, and would like to at this
time apologize for any extra work or problems that this complaint has caused.
 
I certify that the above information is true and correct to the best of my knowledge, information, and belief, and may be reached via telephone at (201) 633-7820, or via postal mail at 8417 Oswego Road #179, Baldwinsville, NY 13027.  E-mail is
mcipdns@gmail.com.
 
Thank you,
 
Michael Crook
MIME element (text/plain)
